labels.name: story
labels.value: User scrolls to the Falak Stats section and checks the static image integrity

name: TC-33 | Verify that the static image in the 'فلك في ارقام' section is displayed correctly without distortion or broken image.
description:
Test Objective: Ensure the static image in the 'فلك في أرقام' section:
✦ Is visible on the page
✦ Loads from a valid source (src)
✦ Is not broken or distorted
Steps:
1) Scroll to the section
2) Check visibility
3) Check src attribute is valid
4) Ensure no broken image icon or size = 0
Expected Result: The static image should be displayed clearly without any distortion or broken image symbol.

steps.name: 🔽 Scrolled to the ‘فلك في أرقام’ section

📌 Retrieved attribute 'src' from element: By.xpath: //section[contains(@class,'surface-section') and .//h2[normalize-space()='فلك في أرقام']]//img[contains(@alt,'فلك في أرقام')] => https://falak.ksaa.gov.sa/assets/icon-statistics-plus-10.png
✅ Falak Stats image is displayed correctly
📥 تم تحميل ملف الإعدادات بنجاح من config.properties
